name: All Hail The Beetle - Don't Jostle That Jewel!
name_original: All Hail The Beetle - Don't Jostle That Jewel!
description:
An indispensable training aid for cat burglars and grave robbers alike, All Hail The Beetle - Don't Jostle That Jewel! provides a safe environment to practice picking up and placing down valuable gems without tripping an alarm system. 

The mouse's cursor is represented by the beetle. Can you lift your computer's mouse and put it back down again without moving the beetle and setting off the security system? 

If you've ever pondered how successful you would be at removing an artifact from its resting place without a hitch, this is the piece of software for you!

WARNING: Game contains screen shake, however it can be turned off.

P.S. No, the game does not know when you've lifted the mouse. You're keeping track of your score board game-style, baby!
